cves.description:
An authenticated command injection vulnerability exists in the Command line interface of HPE Networking Instant On Access Points.  

A successful exploitation could allow a remote attacker with elevated  privileges to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system as a highly privileged user.
Use after free in Microsoft Office allows an unauthorized attacker to execute code locally.
Acceptance of extraneous untrusted data with trusted data in Windows BitLocker allows an unauthorized attacker to bypass a security feature with a physical attack.
problemType: CWE-349: Acceptance of Extraneous Untrusted Data With Trusted Data

cves.description: Protection mechanism failure in Windows BitLocker allows an unauthorized attacker to bypass a security feature with a physical attack.
Protection mechanism failure in Windows BitLocker allows an unauthorized attacker to bypass a security feature with a physical attack.

Missing support for integrity check in Windows Virtualization-Based Security (VBS) Enclave allows an authorized attacker to elevate privileges locally.
problemType: CWE-353: Missing Support for Integrity Check
